meanings.definition: A pin with a short, usually round head and a long, sharp point, used for fastening.
meanings.sent1: I used pushpins to hang up my favorite picture on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The teacher used pushpins to attach the papers to the bulletin board.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten batted the pushpins around the room, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the shiny pushpins on the corkboard.
meanings.sent5: The pushpins gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: She carefully pushpins the note to the corkboard so it doesn't fall off.
meanings.sent2: I pushpins the fabric together before sewing it in place.
meanings.sent3: He pushpins the papers on the wall in a haphazard pattern, creating a unique display.
meanings.sent4: The idea pushpins together different concepts to form a cohesive plan.
meanings.sent5: The team pushpins their strengths to achieve a common goal.
